owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approveConsumer(address,uint256).notice: User grants (or updates) an allowance of DAV units that a given consumer can spend on their behalf.

emergencyRemoveConsumer(address).notice: Owner emergency removal of a consumer from the allowlist.

getClaimable(address,address).notice: View helper: returns user's claimable amount for today's token on a normal day

getConsumedDavUnitsByCycle(address,addre.notice: View helper: returns user's consumed DAV units for a specific token and cycle

getConsumedDavUnitsCurrentCycle(address,.notice: View helper: returns user's consumed DAV units for current cycle of a token

revokeConsumer(address).notice: User revokes a previously granted allowance to a consumer (sets to 0).
